description: A man was taken to hospital after being attacked in the Galliagh area of Derry on Wednesday night.
title: Londonderry: Masked men attack man with crowbar
title_page: Londonderry: Masked men attack man with crowbar    - BBC News
maintext:
A masked gang have attacked a man with a crowbar at a house in Londonderry.
It happened in the Fern Park area of Galliagh at about 23:20 on Wednesday.
"The victim sustained injuries to his head and his hand, and was taken to hospital for treatment," the police have said.
Detectives have appealed for anyone with information about the incident to come forward.
